title: Particle motion velocity based on position graph

content.question: A particle moves along a straight line. The graph of the particle’s position x(t) at time t is shown above for 0 < t < 6. The graph has horizontal tangents at t = 1 and t = 5 and a point of inflection at t = 2 For what values of t is the velocity of the particle increasing?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
